thread.title: Troy Knapp IN at Park Hyatt Washington
thread.title_full: Troy Knapp IN at Park Hyatt Washington

author: Warren Rojas
title: Troy Knapp IN at Park Hyatt Washington
text: Troy Knapp IN at Park Hyatt Washington Seattle native comes to D.C. via Austin Park Hyatt Washington executive chef Troy Knapp [Park Hyatt Washington] Troy Knapp is the next executive chef of Park Hyatt Washington, assuming oversight of the hotel’s various culinary operations, including banquet services, the lounge and award-winning, in-house restaurant Blue Duck Tavern. A 20-year veteran of the hospitality trade, Knapp was most recently executive chef at The Driskill Hotel in Austin, a position he held since 2013. “I appreciate that the kitchen is a place of rich culture and diversity, with people of all walks of life,” Knapp said in a press release. Brad Deboy, chef de cuisine at Blue Duck Tavern since late 2014, will continue to lead that dining program. Blue Duck Tavern was awarded a Michelin star last fall during D.C.’s debut in the international guidebooks. Knapp succeeds Franck Loquet, who was named executive chef of the hotel in October 2015. Knapp’s appointment comes just weeks after Blue Duck Tavern brought on board DBGB alum Erin Reed as pastry chef.
